name: Parking First Adventure
description:
Hello hero! If you want to help baby Kubik get to his grandmother's village,
overcome all obstacles on the way, as well as just be close to the baby, then
start this game))

You are waiting for such game features as:
- 2 modes;
- in each mode, 29 levels;
- Very difficult levels;
- The ability to create your own level and play it;
